org.objectweb.asm.commons

类 SimpleRemapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.objectweb.asm.commons.Remapper
      • org.objectweb.asm.commons.SimpleRemapper

  • public class SimpleRemapper
extends Remapper
    A Remapper using a Map to define its mapping.

      • mapMethodName

        public String mapMethodName(String owner,
                            String name,
                            String desc)
        从类复制的说明: Remapper
        Map method name to the new name. Subclasses can override.
        覆盖:
        mapMethodName 在类中 Remapper
        参数:
        owner - owner of the method.
        name - name of the method.
        desc - descriptor of the method.
        返回:
        new name of the method

                                         String desc)
        从类复制的说明: Remapper
        Map invokedynamic method name to the new name. Subclasses can override.
        覆盖:
        mapInvokeDynamicMethodName 在类中 Remapper
        参数:
        name - name of the invokedynamic.
        desc - descriptor of the invokedynamic.
        返回:
        new invokdynamic name.
